name: Ratopolis
description:
You are the button master. Click the button to spawn and brutally merge rats together. Merge up the rat social hierarchy, and get the rarest and strongest rat!

There are 10+ rats to unlock, the game is as simple as clicking a button.

Controls:

[Left Click] The Button: Spawns rats, Drag to move rats.

[Right Click] Makes rats float up.

Credits for Ratopolis:

Art & Programming: borboss

Fonts:

  • dtinth: Comic Mono (Link)
  • N3tRunn3r: C&C Red Alert (Link)

Sounds:

  • AntumDeluge: Squeaks, "Mouse Imitation" (Link)
  • TinyWorlds: Music, "Happy Adventure" (Link)
  • Kenny.nl: Clicking, "Interface Sounds" (Link)
Note: Ratopolis is the first game I've ever "finished". The game may also contain an unnoticed gamebreaking bug, as I ended up starting the jam late.
